comment: days after nd dose vaccination. I am grateful to say that I'm fully vaccinated. Alhamdulillah. Side effect this time, feverish for one day only.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / after
            :op1 (v / vaccinate-01
                  :mod (d / dose
                        :mod (n / nd)))
            :quant (m2 / multiple
                  :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 1
                        :unit (d2 / day))))
      :snt2 (a2 / appreciate-02
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (s / say-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (v2 / vaccinate-01
                        :ARG1 ii
                        :ARG1-of (f / full-09))))
      :snt3 (e / event
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Alhamdulillah"))
      :snt4 (e2 / effect-03
            :ARG1 (s2 / side)
            :time (t2 / time
                  :mod (t3 / this))
            :ARG0-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG1 (f2 / feverish
                        :duration (t4 / temporal-quantity
                              :quant 1
                              :unit (d3 / day)
                              :mod (o / only))))))
